description: Monitor logs from cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure to detect anomalies related to container or image execution. Look for unusual patterns or log events that deviate from typical behavior. Analytic 1 - Unusual application logs indicating image execution anomalies. sourcetype=application_log EventCode=1000 OR EventCode=1001 | search log_level=ERROR OR log_level=WARNING OR message IN ("failed to pull image", "container crash", "unauthorized access")
